1406310.name: Fantasy Grounds - Silly Goblins 2
1406310.description:
Silly Goblins 2

Want your goblin as Undead? Ship hand? Oriental? Spacefarer? Here you go!

This product includes:
  • Goblin_Boomzapper[shock,ice,bomb,bazooka,goblin,monster,hero,space,astronault]
  • Goblin_Dual_blades[goblin,monster,pirate,Sword]
  • Goblin_FangWarrior[goblin,monster,hero,Space,Astronault,Chainsaw]
  • Goblin_Ghost[goblin,monster,hero,ghost,undead]
  • Goblin_Ghoul[goblin,monster,hero,ghoul,undead]
  • Goblin_HandCannon[goblin,monster,pirate,firearm,cannon]
  • Goblin_Kanabo[Fighter,Club,asian,goblin,monster,hero,Kanabo,oriental]
  • Goblin_Lashcaster[shock,ice,goblin,monster,hero,space,astronault]
  • Goblin_Mongol[Mongol,Archer,asian,goblin,monster,hero,general]
  • Goblin_Monk[Monk,Staff,asian,goblin,monster,hero,priest]
  • Goblin_Musket[goblin,monster,pirate,musket,firearm]
  • Goblin_Pistol_hookhand[goblin,monster,pirate,firearm]
  • Goblin_Samurai[sword,samurai,kensei,asian,goblin,monster,hero,Sea,general,katana]
  • Goblin_ScrapCrafter[fire,flame,mechanic,engineer,goblin,monster,hero,Space,Astronault]
  • Goblin_Shinobi[sword,samurai,kensei,asian,goblin,monster,hero,Sea,general,katana]
  • Goblin_Skeleton[goblin,monster,hero,skeleton,Zombie,undead]
  • Goblin_Viking[Axe,goblin,monster,hero,Sea,Pirate,Viking,Lumber]
  • Goblin_Wightl[goblin,monster,hero,ghoul,wight,undead]
  • Goblin_Zaperator[goblin,monster,hero,Space,Astronault]
  • Goblin_Zombie[goblin,monster,hero,Zombie,undead]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
